abstract_summ: Coronavirus disease-2019 (COVID-19) has emerged as a pandemic affecting millions of adults . The SARS-CoV-2 virus binds to angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) present on brain endothelial and smooth muscle cells . Depletion of ACE2 may tip the balance in favor of the “harmful” ACE1/angiotenin II axis and promote tissue injury .
